metadata.title: RHSA-2023:0199: java-11-openjdk security update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
The java-11-openjdk packages provide the OpenJDK 11 Java Runtime Environment and the OpenJDK 11 Java Software Development Kit.

Security Fix(es):

* OpenJDK: handshake DoS attack against DTLS connections (JSSE, 8287411) (CVE-2023-21835)

* OpenJDK: soundbank URL remote loading (Sound, 8293742) (CVE-2023-21843)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: handshake DoS attack against DTLS connections (JSSE, 8287411)

platform: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.6 Extended Update Support
